ROOT.GetTyphoonList: select B.ID,B.ID AS TYPHOON_CODE,B.CH_NAME,B.EN_NAME,B.START_DATETIME,B.END_DATETIME,L.TYPHOON_TIME,L.PROVINCE||L.CITY||L.DISTRICT from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_COM_TYPHOON_B B LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TYPHOON_LANDING L ON B.ID=L.ID AND L.FORCAST_ORG=0 WHERE B.START_DATETIME<{1} AND B.START_DATETIME>={0} AND B.CH_NAME LIKE '%{2}%' AND B.ID LIKE '9005'||REPLACE({3},'__','')||'%' ORDER BY B.START_DATETIME DESC
ROOT.GetTyphoonList1: select ID,TYPHOON_CODE,CH_NAME,EN_NAME,START_DATETIME,END_DATETIME from OSP_JSCLOUD.SG_WEATHER_TYPHOON_DEF WHERE START_DATETIME<{1} AND END_DATETIME>{0} AND CH_NAME LIKE '%{2}%'
ROOT.GetTyphoonLoadingById: select forcast_org, district_centercoordinate as pt,typhoon_time,province,city from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_typhoon_landing where id={0}
ROOT.GetTyphoonInfoById: select DATE_TIME,LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,MAX_WIND_VELOCITY,MIN_PRESSURE ,ID,'' AS SUBTYPE1,RADIUS7,RADIUS10,MOVE_VELOCITY,MOVE_DIRECTION,0 AS DATATYPE,'real' as clss,'' AS ORG,RADIUS12 from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_COM_TYPHOON_H_PATH_{{1}} WHERE ID='{0}' ORDER BY DATE_TIME
ROOT.GetTyphoonForeInfoById: select TYPHOON_TIME AS DATE_TIME,LNG AS LONGITUDE,LAT AS LATITUDE,WIND_VELOCITY AS MAX_WIND_VELOCITY,PRESSURE AS MIN_PRESSURE ,f.ID,'' AS SUBTYPE1,'' AS RADIUS7,'' AS RADIUS10,'' AS MOVE_VELOCITY,'' AS MOVE_DIRECTION,1 AS DATATYPE,'fore'||f.forcast_org as clss,o.name as orgname,'' AS RADIUS12 from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_com_typhoon_h_forcast_{{3}} f join (SELECT id,forcast_org,max(forcast_time) as forcast_time from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_com_typhoon_h_forcast_{{3}} group by id, forcast_org ) g on f.id=g.id and f.forcast_org=g.forcast_org and f.forcast_time=g.forcast_time LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_forcastorg o ON f.forcast_org=o.code where f.id='{0}' AND TYPHOON_TIME>{1} /*AND TYPHOON_TIME<{2}*/ and f.forcast_org<>2004 order by f.forcast_org,typhoon_time,f.forcast_time desc
ROOT.GetEffectLineAC: SELECT L.ID,V.NAME AS VOLNAME,L.NAME,P.NAME AS GRIDNAME,D.NAME AS DISPATCHNAME FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TYPHOON_AFFECT R JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B L ON R.AFFECT_TYPE=2 AND AFFECT_OBJ_ID=L.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON L.VOLTAGE_TYPE=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B P ON L.GRID_ID=P.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B D ON L.DISPATCH_ORG_ID=D.ID WHERE R.TYPHOON_ID={0} AND R.START_TIME<={1} AND R.END_TIME>{1}
ROOT.GetEffectLineDC: SELECT L.ID,V.NAME AS VOLNAME,L.NAME,P.NAME AS GRIDNAME,D.NAME AS DISPATCHNAME FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TYPHOON_AFFECT R JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B L ON R.AFFECT_TYPE=2 AND AFFECT_OBJ_ID=L.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON L.VOLTAGE_TYPE=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B P ON L.GRID_ID=P.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B D ON L.DISPATCH_ORG_ID=D.ID WHERE R.TYPHOON_ID={0} AND R.START_TIME<={1} AND R.END_TIME>{1}
ROOT.GetEffectLine: SELECT * FROM (same:GetEffectLineAC UNION same:GetEffectLineDC) A ORDER BY VOLNAME DESC,NAME
ROOT.GetEffectStation: same:sgc/main:GetEffectStation:same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TYPHOON_AFFECT R:R.AFFECT_TYPE=1 AND AFFECT_OBJ_ID=S.ID:R.TYPHOON_ID={0} AND R.START_TIME<={1} AND R.END_TIME>{1}
ROOT.GetEffectPlant: same:sgc/main:GetEffectPlant:same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TYPHOON_AFFECT R:R.AFFECT_TYPE=3 AND AFFECT_OBJ_ID=S.ID:R.TYPHOON_ID={0} AND R.START_TIME<={1} AND R.END_TIME>{1}
ROOT.GetReportDept: SELECT '__' AS ID,'全部' AS NAME UNION ALL SELECT SUBSTR(ID,5,6) AS ID,NAME_ABBREVIATION AS NAME FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B WHERE ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT '0021'||SUBSTR(ID,5,6) FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_COM_TYPHOON_B )
ROOT.GetEffectDevice: select o.ID,o.NAME, o.GRID_ID,volid,V.NAME AS VOLNAME,P.NAME AS GRIDNAME,AFFECT_TYPE FROM ( SELECT s.id,S.NAME,S.PG_ID AS GRID_ID,S.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE as volid,R.TYPHOON_ID ,R.START_TIME,R.END_TIME, R.AFFECT_TYPE FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TYPHOON_AFFECT R JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_SUBSTATION_B S ON R.AFFECT_TYPE=1 AND AFFECT_OBJ_ID=S.ID union all SELECT L.ID,L.NAME,L.GRID_ID AS GRID_ID,L.VOLTAGE_TYPE as volid,R.TYPHOON_ID,R.START_TIME ,R.END_TIME, R.AFFECT_TYPE FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TYPHOON_AFFECT R JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_ACLINE_B L ON R.AFFECT_TYPE=2 AND AFFECT_OBJ_ID=L.ID union all SELECT L.ID,L.NAME,L.GRID_ID AS GRID_ID,L.VOLTAGE_TYPE as volid ,R.TYPHOON_ID,R.START_TIME,R.END_TIME, R.AFFECT_TYPE FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TYPHOON_AFFECT R JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DEV_DCLINE_B L ON R.AFFECT_TYPE=2 AND AFFECT_OBJ_ID=L.ID union all SELECT S.ID,S.NAME,S.CONNECTIVE_PG_ID AS GRID_ID,S.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE as volid,R.TYPHOON_ID,R.START_TIME,R.END_TIME, R.AFFECT_TYPE FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TYPHOON_AFFECT R JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PLANT_B S ON R.AFFECT_TYPE=3 AND AFFECT_OBJ_ID=S.ID ) o left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE V ON o.volid=V.CODE LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaNameSG_CON_PWRGRID_B P ON concat(SUBSTR(o.GRID_ID,1,6),'0000')=P.ID WHERE o.TYPHOON_ID={0} AND o.START_TIME<={1} AND o.END_TIME>{2}
ROOT.GetTyphoonQYZ: select ID AS TYPHOON_CODE,CH_NAME,EN_NAME,to_char(START_DATETIME,'mm-dd hh:mm'),to_char(END_DATETIME,'mm-dd hh:mm') from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_COM_TYPHOON_B where typhoonID={0} ORDER BY START_DATETIME DESC
ROOT.GetPassPathById: select TYPHOON_TIME,LATITUDE,LONGITUDE,CITY,REGION from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_typhoon_passingarea where typhoon_id='{0}' and type='path' order by typhoon_time,CITY,REGION
ROOT.GetForePathById: select TYPHOON_TIME,LATITUDE,LONGITUDE,CITY,REGION,FORCAST_ORG from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_typhoon_passingarea p join ( select typhoon_id as id,forcast_org as org,max(forcast_time) as ftime from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_typhoon_passingarea where type='forcast' group by typhoon_id,forcast_org ) g on p.typhoon_id=g.id and p.forcast_org=g.org and p.forcast_time=g.ftime where typhoon_id='{0}' and type='forcast' order by typhoon_time,CITY,REGION
ROOT.GetRegions: select distinct region,districtname,parentregion,level from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaNamesg_con_district where level<>'district' order by region
ROOT.GetEffectPlantList: SELECT s.capacity,AFFECT_OBJ_ID,0 AS F FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TYPHOON_AFFECT a LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_S s ON a.AFFECT_OBJ_ID=s.id AND s.VOLTAGE_TYPE=9999 AND s.state_code=1003 where AFFECT_TYPE=3 AND TYPHOON_ID={0} AND IS_FORECAST=0-- AND START_TIME<={1} UNION ALL SELECT s.capacity,AFFECT_OBJ_ID,1 FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameYSH_TYPHOON_AFFECT a LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_S s ON a.AFFECT_OBJ_ID=s.id AND s.VOLTAGE_TYPE=9999 AND s.state_code=1003 where AFFECT_TYPE=3 AND TYPHOON_ID={0} AND IS_FORECAST={2}-- AND START_TIME>{1}
ROOT.GetPassMaxTime: select max(typhoon_time),type from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_typhoon_passingarea where typhoon_id='{0}' group by type ORDER BY type
ROOT.GetPassRegion: SELECT DISTINCT REGION FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppNameysh_weather_typhoon_passingarea WHERE TYPE='path' and typhoon_id='{0}'
